title: Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData)
description: Bug 44164 - Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData); import org.eclipse.swt.widgets.; public class TestImageInvalidImage { public static void main(String[] args) { ImageData data = new ImageData(10, 10, 1, new PaletteData(0xff0000, 0x00ff00, 0x0000ff)); Image image = new Image(Display.getDefault(), data); // image.dispose(); } }
OB: The bug report does not include an observed behavior (OB).
EB: This should be added to the javadoc.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a Java class with the provided code snippet.
2. Compile and run the class.
3. Check the javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData) to see if the suggested update is missing.
